alert.note: Alert for Hooker; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hooker and northwestern Thomas Counties through 430 PM CDT/330 PM MDT/... At 356 PM CDT/256 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Seneca, or 10 miles east of Mullen, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seneca and Norway. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 192 and 208. Highway 83 between mile markers 141 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT/900 PM MDT/ for north central and west central Nebraska.
